# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/onebit.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/onebit.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/onebita.lib ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/onebita.lib ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/onebitb.lib ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/onebitb.lib ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME ONEBIT/onebit.cir COMMAND Xyce onebit.cir )
set_property(TEST ONEBIT/onebit.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel")
set_tests_properties(ONEBIT/onebit.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP onebit.cir)
add_test(NAME ONEBIT/onebit.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} onebit.cir ${OutputDataDir}/ONEBIT/onebit.cir.prn onebit.cir.prn )
set_tests_properties(ONEBIT/onebit.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED onebit.cir)
